Name: Greater Valkyrate
ReputationStatements: You wanna get paid, don't you? Take this job, and we all end up with more money. You've nothing to lose.
Mercenary, we got a Job for you and Money to waste. Do this and you will be compensated above your station.
Welcome Mercenary, we got another Job that requires attention, take it and dont dare to fail us now.
Still hungry for Money i see. We got something that needs be shot up.
We got a nice Raid planned and need something gone, do this, and we share in the Riches.
Ahh You're back for more? We always got someone to kill and places to plunder, will you join us?
Welcome Friend, join us on this Raid and share in the Booty.
MissionSuccessStatements: Well done Mercenary, you are almost worth the money we spent on you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: At least you got the Job done. Learn from this before we have to kill you ourself.
BadFaithFailureStatements: You DARED to fail us? Begone, before i kill you myself!.
Description: The union of two breakaway factions from the Oberon Confederation, namely Butte Hold and Morgraine's Valkyrate in 3028 created the Greater Valkyrate, a Pirate Kingdom that kept the Oberon Confederation in check as their strong antagonist. It was notable for emphasizing the dominance of women over men.
